data.label: Content Strategist
data.description: Identifies trending topics and defines content goals.

data.label: Scriptwriter
data.description: Writes the video script based on the topic and tone.

data.label: Voiceover Artist
data.description: Records narration based on the finalized script.

data.label: Video Editor
data.description: Edits footage, syncs audio, and adds visuals.

data.label: Thumbnail Designer
data.description: Creates click-attracting thumbnails for the video.

data.label: Uploader & Optimizer
data.description: Uploads the video and applies SEO metadata.

data.label: Distribution Manager
data.description: Shares video on social media and coordinates promotion.
